text:
In Texas, the average gas price for a gallon of gas hit $4.60. The Biden administration has declared war on American energy, and Americans are feeling the pain at the gas pump right at the start of the summer travel season. 

A year ago, Texans were paying $2.70.

@IDF Eternal vigilance is what’s in order. (Thank GOD for our IDF!) And a willingness to negotiate is in order to live in peace. Are the terrorists listening, or do they only understand power & strength? Keep up y’all’s superb protection IDF! GOD be with y’all!
